definition: to jump/to hop/to skip over/to bounce/to palpitate
to pluck (a string)/to play (a string instrument)/to spring or leap/to shoot (e.g. with a catapult)/(of cotton) to fluff or tease/to flick/to flip/to accuse/to impeach/elastic (of materials)

sentences.english: The skip bombs were fused at fifteen seconds there was no room for error.
sentences.chinese: 跳彈的引信只有15秒，沒有任何出錯的餘地。

sentences.english: How do you explain this ricochet ?
sentences.chinese: 那你怎麼解釋這顆跳彈？

sentences.english: It was very simple and incredibly dangerous.
sentences.chinese: 跳彈轟炸非常簡單但也非常危險。
